titleStmt.title: By the Major. Forasmuch as it is conceived and apprehended by the Court of Common-councell, that the citie at the present in great danger; ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Warner, John, Sir, d. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, Printer to the City of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffaringdon within"; "different from ye former".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
